questionText: Damage to commercial systems and thousands of personal computers from viruses has been extensive.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: A virus will generally erase a computer's hard drive
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: A worm does no direct damage to the computer.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: A worm insinuates itself among programs and attaches itself to every message sent.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: David Smith of Aberdeen, NJ, was arrested for originating the Melissa worm.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Explore worm had also originated in Israel.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Computer viruses have turned up in just about every part of the world.
author: A2IU5TX5S0FA1C

questionText: Worms and viruses are mostly spread by emails and attachments thereto.
author: A2IU5TX5S0FA1C

questionText: Computer viruses infect both large computer networks and personal PCs.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Computer viruses causes information loss,erasure of the hard drive, and system shutdowns.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Brain was followed by Chernobyl.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Its origin was traced to the work of a computer engineering student, Chen Ing-hau.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Precautions include making backups of all important files.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Antiviral programs must be continuously updated to react to new viruses.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The best defense against computer viruses includes installing anti-virus programs.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Brain was the first known virus to hit personal computers.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The Chernobyl virus infected up to one million computers in Southeast Asia.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: Most viruses enter computers via email attachments.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The Computer Emergency Response Team, (CERT) tracks viruses.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: One of the best defenses against computer viruses includes installing anti-virus programs.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The Melissa virus affected more than 100,000 computers worldwide.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The origin of the Melissa virus has been traced to David Smith of New Jersey.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: Numerous computer viruses have damaged computers worldwide.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Happy99 virus was disruptive.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Papa virus used Microsoft Excel attachments to send out 60 emails.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Chernobyl, also called CIH, virus could erase a computer's hard drive.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Killer C-disk THUS attacked through email on December 13, 1999.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Computer viruses have damaged computers throughout the world.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: The Melissa virus spread via infected email and attacked computers running Microsoft Word programs.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: The Word-Concept and Wazzu viruses attacked Word documents.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: A computer programmer was arrested and charged with creating the Melissa virus
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: The Melissa virus mutated several times.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: W32/Kriz.3862 was set to strike on Christmas.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: The Dhaka virus is also known as the T-virus.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: Two notable computer viruses stemmed from Bangladesh.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: A number of new destructive viruses have been detected on the Internet.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Three in particular have severely damaged computer systems around the world.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Melissa attacks Word 97 and Word 2000 programs.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The 'love bug' virus originated by a Philippine couple.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Chernobyl virus activated on the anniversary of the Chernobyl disaster, April 26.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The Chernobyl virus enters in e-mail, floppies, or downloaded software.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: Melissa makes its way into computers as an e-mail attachment .
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO
